message: Are there any ways to provide a new pth file instead of the auto-generated one that distribute/setuptools creates?
And yes, I know... that's dangerous, shouldn't do it, etc., and so on, in ad infinitum.  I have a real need right now.
Nope, I mean a whole different pth file.
you mean the default location for installed packages (eg. via `python setup.py install) ?
